docs.summary: Events that are fired from a Wix Store.
description: Wix Stores events are fired in you site's backend when certain events occur in your site's store.
You can write event handlers that react to these events. Event handler functions
receive data that corresponds to the event that has occurred. Use event handlers
to create custom responses to store events.
Note that backend events don't work when previewing your site.
To add a store event handler, add an **events.js** file to the **Backend** section
of your site if one does not already exist. All event handler functions for your
site are defined in this file.
Event handler functions are defined using the following pattern:
```javascript
export function <wixAppName>_<eventName>(event) { }
For example, an event handler that handles cart abandonment in a Wix Store looks
like this:
```javascript
export function wixStores_onCartAbandoned(event) { }
Note that backend events don't work when previewing your site.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the cart that was abandoned.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a visitor abandons a shopping cart.
description: The `onCartAbandoned()` event handler runs when a visitor adds an item to the
shopping cart, but does not complete the purchase within 1 hour.
If the visitor completes the purchase after it has been abandoned, an
[`onCartRecovered`](#onCartRecovered) event is fired.
You can use this event to reach out to the visitor who abandoned the shopping cart.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the cart that was completed.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a visitor completes a purchase from a shopping cart.
description: The `onCartCompleted()` event handler runs when a visitor completes a
purchase from a shopping cart.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the cart that was created.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a visitor adds a product to a shopping cart.
description: The `onCartCreated()` event handler runs when a visitor adds an item to the
shopping cart.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the cart that was recovered.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a visitor completes a purchase from an abandoned shopping cart.
description: The `onCartRecovered()` event handler runs when a visitor completes a purchase
more than 1 hour after items have been added to a shopping cart.
You can use this event to cancel planned communications with the visitor who abandoned the shopping cart.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the product collection that was created.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a product collection is created.
description: The `onCollectionCreated()` event handler runs when a product collection
is added to a store.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the product collection that was deleted.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a product collection is deleted.
description: The `onCollectionDeleted()` event handler runs when a product collection
is deleted from a store.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the product collection that was updated.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a product collection is updated.
description: The `onCollectionUpdated()` event handler runs when a product collection
is updated in a store.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the updated inventory item.

docs.summary: An event that fires when an inventory item's information is updated.
description: The `onInventoryItemUpdated()` event handler runs when information for an inventory item
is updated in a store.

docs.summary: An event that fires when the inventory information of a product variant is updated.
description: The `onInventoryVariantUpdated()` event handler runs when inventory information for a product
variant is updated in a store.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a new order is placed.
description: The `onNewOrder()` event handler runs when a new order is placed in your site's
store. The received [`NewOrderEvent`](wix-stores-backend.Events.html#NewOrderEvent)
object contains information about the new order that was placed.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the product that was created.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a product is created.
description: The `onProductCreated()` event handler runs when a new product
is added to a store.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the product that was deleted.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a product is deleted.
description: The `onProductDeleted()` event handler runs when a product
is deleted from a store.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the product that was updated.

docs.summary: An event that fires when a product is updated.
description: The `onProductUpdated()` event handler runs when a product
is updated in a store.

params.name: event
params.doc: Information about the product collection that was deleted.

docs.summary: An event that fires when variant information for a product is updated.
description: The `onVariantsUpdated()` event handler runs when variant information for a product
is updated in a store.

docs.summary: An object representing a shopping cart that was abandoned.

members.name: abandonTime
members.doc: Time the abandoned cart was abandoned.

members.name: buyerInfo
members.doc: Information about the visitor who abandoned the shopping cart.

members.name: cartId
members.doc: ID of the shopping cart that was abandoned.

members.name: checkoutUrl
members.doc: URL of the abandoned cart's checkout page.

members.name: couponId
members.doc: ID of coupon used in the abandoned cart.

members.name: creationTime
members.doc: Time the abandoned cart was created.

members.name: itemsCount
members.doc: Number of items in the abandoned cart.

members.name: totals
members.doc: Abandoned cart totals.

docs.summary: An object representing a shopping cart that was completed.

members.name: cartId
members.doc: ID of the shopping cart that was completed.

members.name: completedTime
members.doc: Time the shopping cart was completed.

members.name: buyerInfo
members.doc: The buyer's information.

members.name: buyerNote
members.doc: Message from the buyer.

members.name: appliedCoupon
members.doc: Coupon applied in the shopping cart.

members.name: billingAddress
members.doc: Billing address.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency of the shopping cart.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: The order's units of weight. One of: `"KG"`, `"LB"`, or `"UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT"`.

members.name: totals
members.doc: The shopping cart's totals.

members.name: shippingInfo
members.doc: The shopping cart's shipping information.

docs.summary: An object representing a shopping cart that was created.

members.name: cartId
members.doc: ID of the shopping cart that was created.

members.name: creationTime
members.doc: Time the shopping cart was created.

members.name: buyerInfo
members.doc: The buyer's information.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: The order's units of weight. One of: `"KG"`, `"LB"`, or `"UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT"`.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency of the shopping cart.

members.name: totals
members.doc: The shopping cart's totals.

docs.summary: An object representing a shopping cart that was recovered.

members.name: abandonedTime
members.doc: Time the recovered cart was abandoned.

members.name: cartId
members.doc: ID of the shopping cart that was abandoned.

members.name: creationTime
members.doc: Time the recovered cart was originally created.

members.name: recoveredTime
members.doc: Time the cart was recovered.

docs.summary: An object representing the totals of a shopping cart.

members.name: subtotal
members.doc: Subtotal of all the line items in the abandoned cart, not including shipping and tax.

members.name: total
members.doc: Total of all the line items in the abandoned cart, including shipping and tax.

members.name: formattedTotal
members.doc: Total formatted with currency symbol.

docs.summary: An object representing a product collection that was created.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the created collection.

members.name: name
members.doc: Collection name.

members.name: mainMedia
members.doc: Main product media item (image) URL.

docs.summary: An object representing a product collection that was deleted.

members.name: collectionId
members.doc: ID of the delete collection.

docs.summary: An object representing a product collection that was updated.

members.name: collectionId
members.doc: ID of the updated collection.

members.name: updatedFields
members.doc: Names of the collection fields that were updated.

docs.summary: An object representing an inventory item that was updated.

members.name: inventoryItemId
members.doc: ID of the inventory item.

members.name: externalId
members.doc: External ID of the inventory item. For example, the product ID for\n inventory items which are store products.

members.name: trackInventory
members.doc: Whether the item's inventory is tracked.

docs.summary: An object representing product variant information that was updated.

members.name: inventoryItemId
members.doc: ID of the inventory item.

members.name: externalId
members.doc: External ID of the inventory item. For example, the product ID for\n inventory items which are store products.

members.name: variants
members.doc: List of variants that were updated.

docs.summary: An object representing a new order from a store.

members.name: orderId
members.doc: The ID of the order, auto-generated when an order is created an unique within all Wix Stores.

members.name: number
members.doc: Running order number unique to the current store.

members.name: dateCreated
members.doc: The date the order was created.

members.name: buyerInfo
members.doc: The buyer's information.

members.name: currency
members.doc: The currency code for all of the order's prices.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: The order's units of weight. One of: `"KG"`, `"LB"`, or `"UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT_UNIT"`.

members.name: totals
members.doc: The order's totals.

members.name: paymentStatus
members.doc: The order's payment status. One of: `"PAID"` or `"NOT_PAID"`.

members.name: fulfillmentStatus
members.doc: The order's fulfillment status. One of: `"FULFILLED"` or `"NOT_FULFILLED"`.

docs.summary: An object representing the specific choices from the product's options.

members.name: optionKey
members.doc:
Value of the option. This key name is
 dependent on the option changed in the product. For example, if a product
 has a size option, this key value will be something like "Size" and its value
 will be something like "Large".
 
 `optionKey` is not case-sensitive. Therefore the values for the option keys `"Size"` `"SIZE"` and `"size"` are combined.

docs.summary: An object representing a product that was created.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Product ID.

members.name: name
members.doc: Product name.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Product stock keeping unit.

members.name: formattedDiscountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted product price formatted with the currency.

members.name: visible
members.doc: Whether the product is shown in the store.

members.name: mainMedia
members.doc: Main product media item (image or video) URL.

members.name: discountedPrice
members.doc: Discounted product price.

members.name: formattedPrice
members.doc: Product price formatted with the currency.

members.name: price
members.doc: Product price.

members.name: mediaItems
members.doc: Product media items.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Product currency.

members.name: productPageUrl
members.doc: URL to the product's page.

docs.summary: An object representing a product that was deleted.

members.name: productId
members.doc: ID of the deleted product.

docs.summary: An object representing a product that was updated.

members.name: productId
members.doc: ID of the updated product.

members.name: updatedFields
members.doc: Names of the product fields that were updated.

docs.summary: An object representing a product variants that was updated.

members.name: variantId
members.doc: ID of the variant that was updated.

members.name: updatedFields
members.doc: Names of the product variant fields that were updated.

members.name: choices
members.doc: <Placeholder text>

docs.summary: An object representing product variant that was updated.

members.name: id
members.doc: ID of the productVariant that was updated.

members.name: oldValue
members.doc: Old variant value.

members.name: newValue
members.doc: Updated variant value.

docs.summary: An object representing a product variant value.

members.name: inStock
members.doc: Whether the variant is in stock.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Number of items in stock.

docs.summary: An object representing product variants that were updated.

members.name: productId
members.doc: ID of the product in which variants were updated.

members.name: variants
members.doc: Variants that were updated.
